description: The long-sleeve shirt from the “La Liste” collection features the typical colors of the special edition accompanied by a large MAMMUT print on the sleeve. It’s not just its looks that are impressive: the slightly stronger GOTS-certified organic cotton material feels pleasant on the skin and makes sure you don’t overheat or feel too cold when out freeriding or in everyday life. A comfortable long-sleeve for daily wear. Made in Europe. The film “La Liste – Everything or Nothing” documents the project conceived by MAMMUT Pro Team Athlete Jérémie Heitz, in which he skis the most spectacular 6,000 meter peaks in an unprecedented new style. This sequel to the sensational first film has once again been produced in partnership with Mammut.
name: Mammut La Liste LS - Mens
